QuestData.Title: Good Help is Hard to Find
QuestData.Description: I've failed! I tried to meet our Kaja'Cola quotas, but you know troll slaves these days. Good help is hard to find!$B$BI think your personal touch is called for. A shock from the battery on your Goblin All-In-1-Der Belt should do the trick. Adjust their attitudes and the rest will fall in line.$B$BKaja'Cola production must continue or the Trade Prince will have all of our heads!
QuestData.LogDescription: Adjust the attitudes of 8 Defiant Trolls.
QuestData.CompletionText: A good start, $g sir : ma'am;, but might I suggest that you may want to make an example of a few more?
QuestData.RewardText: I couldn't have done better myself. In fact, I didn't.$B$BI'm sure that in no time at all we'll all be talking about the great and powerful, and may I add extremely wealthy, Trade $g Prince : Princess; $n!
